scripts.build:www: cd www && npm run build && cd .. && apidoc -i routers -o www/dist/apidoc
scripts.build:win: npm run build:www && go generate && go build -tags release -ldflags "-s -w" -o EasyDarwin.exe
scripts.build:lin: npm run build:www && go generate && go build -tags release -ldflags "-X 'main.buildDateTime=$(date '+%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')' -X 'main.gitCommitCode=$(git rev-list --full-history --all --abbrev-commit --max-count 1)' -s -w" -o easydarwin
scripts.dev: cd www && npm run build && cd .. && go-bindata-assetfs -debug -o bindata/bindata.go -pkg bindata -prefix www/dist www/dist/... && go build -o EasyDarwin.exe
scripts.dev:lin: cd www && npm run build && cd .. && go-bindata-assetfs -debug -o bindata/bindata.go -pkg bindata -prefix www/dist www/dist/... && go build -o easydarwin
